oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Willis Crawford Rushing family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Willis Crawford Rushing (1826-1916) was a Civil War veteran living in Benton County in 1897. He is pictured here with his family. Seated, left to right: Lively Etta Rushing Fry (1863-1943), Ernest E. Fry (1868-1937), Sophia Ann Rushing (1828-1913), Willis Crawford Rushing (1826-1916), Gaylon "Bob Pete" Rushing (1886-?" Bettie Cox Rushing, and John Crawford Rushing (1860-1942). Standing, left to right: Holden Rushing (1869-1948), Sophia Ann Rushing Lockhart (1865-1946), Finis Ewing Rushing (1873-1955), Mary Ida Rushing Morrow (1861-1899), Walter Harris Rushing (1858-1906), Robert Willis "Greasy Bob" Rushing (1855-1939), Vachel Rushing (1866-1909), Nathaniel Rushing (1871-1914), and Leonidus Rushing (1857-1936).
